original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa

original: Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1)
analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: 13.22. Sanidassanattika
analyzed: sani dassana ttika

original: Hetu
analyzed: hetu

original: Anidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: anidassana sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca na anidassana sappaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Anidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: anidassana sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca na sanidassana sappaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Anidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: anidassana sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Anidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho ca naanidassanaappaṭigho
analyzed: anidassana sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ ca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ

original: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Anidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā anidassana sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca na anidassana sappaṭighaḥ

original: ca naanidassanaappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Anidassanasappaṭighaṁ
analyzed: ca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā anidassana sappaṭigha

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho ca naanidassanasappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca na sanidassana sappaṭighaḥ ca na anidassana sappaṭighaḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … cha.
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā cha

original: Anidassanasappaṭighañca anidassanaappaṭighañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … cha. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: anidassana sappaṭigham ca anidassana appaṭigham ca dhammam paṭicca na sanidassana sappaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā cha

original: Hetuyā aṭṭhārasa, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate aṭṭhārasa. (Sabbattha vitthāro. Sahajātavārampi …pe… sampayuttavārampi vitthāretabbaṁ.)
analyzed: hetuyā aṭṭhārasa ārammaṇe tīṇi pe avigate aṭṭhārasa sabbattha vitthāro sahajāta vārampi pe sampayutta vārampi vitthāretabba

original: Hetu-ārammaṇa
analyzed: hetu ārammaṇa

original: Anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo naanidassanaappaṭighassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: anidassana appaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ na anidassana appaṭighassa dhammassa hetu paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo nasanidassanasappaṭighassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: anidassana appaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ na sa nidassana sappaṭighassa dhammassa hetu paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo naanidassanasappaṭighassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: anidassana appaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ na anidassana sappaṭighassa dhammassa hetu paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo nasanidassanasappaṭighassa ca naanidassanaappaṭighassa
analyzed: anidassana appaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ na sa nidassana sappaṭighassa ca na anidassana appaṭighassa

original: ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. Anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo naanidassanasappaṭighassa
analyzed: ca dhammassa hetu paccayena paccayaḥ anidassana appaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ na anidassana sappaṭighassa

original: ca naanidassanaappaṭighassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. Anidassanaappaṭigho
analyzed: ca na anidassana appaṭighassa ca dhammassa hetu paccayena paccayaḥ anidassana appaṭighaḥ

original: dhammo nasanidassanasappaṭighassa ca naanidassanasappaṭighassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: dhammaḥ na sa nidassana sappaṭighassa ca na a nidassana sappaṭighassa ca dhammassa hetu paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo nasanidassanasappaṭighassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ na sa nidassana sappaṭighassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ tīṇi saṅkhitta

original: Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā dvādasa, anantare tīṇi …pe… sahajāte aṭṭhārasa,
analyzed: hetuyā cha ārammaṇe nava adhipatiyā dvādasa anantare tīṇi pe sahajāte aṭṭhārasa

original: aññamaññe terasa, nissaye aṭṭhārasa, upanissaye nava, purejāte aṭṭhārasa, pacchājāte
analyzed: aññamaññe terasa nissaye aṭṭhārasa upanissaye nava purejāte aṭṭhārasa pacchājāte

original: cha, āsevane tīṇi, kamme vipāke āhāre cha, indriye nava, jhāne magge cha, sampayutte
analyzed: cha āsevane tīṇi kamme vipāke āhāre cha indriye nava jhāne magge cha sampayutte

original: tīṇi, vippayutte nava …pe… avigate sattavīsa. (Pañhāvāraṁ vitthāretabbaṁ.)
analyzed: tīṇi vippayutte nava pe avigate sattavīsa pañhā vāram
